bug.description:

Hey <denchmark-link:https://github.com/yaroslavvb>@yaroslavvb</denchmark-link>
Could you check if the issue still persists? I think the logs now do not have overlapping text anymore. Due to the thread going stale, we could do with closing this issue if the behaviour is no longer noticed.
